message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 75/25 split in favor of Alice. I believe this offers a fair balance considering the potential inflation.
I think 60/40 is a more reasonable split, considering the initial amount and potential for inflation. Your turn to decide.
Considering the previous offers and the risk of inflation, I propose an equal split of the $10,000. This ensures fairness and stability for both parties.
